<br />

Welcome to **Principles of Spatial Analysis**, one of the four core modules for the MSc in Geographic and Social Data Science here at [UCL Geography](https://www.geog.ucl.ac.uk/). 

Content to be made available at the start of the academic year. The content for 2021-2022 has now been archived and can be found here: [[Link]](https://jtvandijk.github.io/GEOG0114_20212022)
